text: During an appearance on Ireland's "The Late Late Show," Ed Sheeran said that he has had a song written for the James Bond movie franchise for three years now, "just in case" anyone associated with the film calls him up to ask for one. They haven't.
title: Ed Sheeran wrote a James Bond song three years ago 'just in case'
